# How to mass upload OPEN locations

## Regardless of whether you are in the onboarding process or experiencing significant expansion in your franchise, you can efficiently provide your franchisees with access to Delightree by utilizing our mass upload feature.

### Step 1. Navigate to 'Teamspace' and download our sample sheet to enter in your locations

![Untitled design](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Untitled%20design.gif?width=688&height=384&name=Untitled%20design.gif)

### Step 2. Once you have inputted your locations, download your completed sheet in any of the supported formats.

_Don't forget toÂ **delete** Row 2 in the sample sheet!_

![Untitled design (1)](https://8332146.fs1.hubspotusercontent-na1.net/hub/8332146/hubfs/Untitled%20design%20(1).gif?width=688&height=384&name=Untitled%20design%20(1).gif)

### Step 3. Upload your completed sheet by through the Locations tab under Teamspace (as depicted in Step 1).

###### Was this article helpful?    YesNo
